item.description:
We're trying something new! The plan is to meet at 7pm and stay for trivia which starts at 8pm and ends at 10pm. The trivia is non-political usual bar trivia, but we can have fun making some overtly political team names. Teams consist of 4-5 people. Prizes go to the winners!

Can't find us? Call or text my cell: (617) 784-7764.

http://www.taverninthesquare.com/porter-square/events

"Stump Triva at 8pm! Stump! Trivia is a team trivia contest played in bars and restaurants all over the country. Get your team of people to one of our bars & pubs to test your skill at an assortment of trivia questions, from Anatomy to Literature, Movies to History."
item.name: Meetup: Trivia Night!
